product_overview: LarosaWebApp is a comprehensive web-based Point of Sale (POS) and Inventory Management System designed for LAROSAPOT, a retail business selling pots and plant accessories. It manages the entire business cycle including product inventory, customer and vendor management, sales transactions, quotations, invoices, and payment settlements, all integrated with Google Sheets for backend data storage and offline-first capabilities using IndexedDB.
core_goals: Enable seamless management of products, customers, vendors, and transactions within a single web application.
Provide reliable offline-first functionality via IndexedDB caching and synchronization with Google Sheets.
Facilitate accurate and efficient sales processing including quotation creation, invoice generation, and payment settlements.
Deliver real-time business statistics and reporting through an interactive dashboard with visual charts.
Ensure secure user authentication and session management for system access control.
Implement robust backend operations with Google Apps Script to handle CRUD operations on business data.
Maintain a user-friendly interface with responsive feedback mechanisms like loading states and error messages.
key_features: Authentication module with session management and error handling.
Dashboard displaying key business metrics and sales trends using charts.
Point of Sale (Kasir) interface with customer/product autocomplete, formula support, and transaction editing.
Quotation module for creating, viewing, and converting quotations to invoices.
Product inventory management with filtering, pagination, and stock level tracking.
Customer and vendor management modules with data tables and live updates.
Transaction history management including viewing, editing, and deleting invoices with related records.
Payment settlement (Pelunasan) module to handle down payments and full payments, including editing payment records.
Invoice generation and printing modules supporting different invoice types (full payment and DP).
Data synchronization layer using Google Apps Script for CRUD operations and maintaining cached data locally.
user_flow_summary: User logs in via the authentication page and is redirected to the dashboard upon successful login.
From the dashboard, user navigates to various modules such as Kasir (POS), Product Inventory, Customer, and Vendor management.
In Kasir, user creates new transactions with customer and product autocomplete, saves transactions as full payment or down payment, and optionally edits existing invoices.
User can create quotations, view quotation details, and convert quotations to invoices for checkout.
Product inventory can be browsed with search and filters, with capabilities to add, edit, or delete products with feedback loading states.
Customer and vendor data can be managed through dedicated pages including adding, editing, and deleting records.
User reviews transaction history, with functionality to view, edit, or delete invoices and their related items.
Payment settlements are managed by listing unpaid invoices, processing payments, and editing payment records with default payment method presets.
Invoices are generated and printed from completed transactions with clear distinction between full and partial payments.
validation_criteria: Successful user authentication and session persistence with correct error messaging.
Dashboard cards and charts display accurate, up-to-date business statistics.
POS functionalities provide correct autocomplete suggestions and accurate transactional calculations including formulas.
Quotations are correctly created, stored, and convertible to invoices.
Product inventory supports search, filtering, pagination, and CRUD operations with proper loading feedback.
Customer and vendor management reflect accurate data changes and transaction counts.
Transaction history enables reliable viewing, editing, and deletion of invoices and associated data.
Payment settlement updates invoice statuses correctly and retains accurate payment records.
Invoices are generated with correct formats and printable layouts for both full payment and DP types.
Backend API handles all CRUD operations with correct response statuses and error handling as tested with 100% pass rate.
